thread.title: Canada cuts immigration targets

title: Canada cuts immigration targets
text: Live Streaming 24/7 Canada cuts immigration targets Canada will admit over 20% fewer immigrants over the next 2 years, with its target for 2027 set even lower. The federal government estimates the cut will reduce the population by 0.2% over 2 years. 36m ago Latest Videos 1:23 [ ](https://kitchener.citynews.ca/video/2024/10/24/lawsuit-filed-against-u-s-mcdonalds-over-e-coli-outbreak/) Lawsuit filed against U.S. McDonald’s over E. coli outbreak The first lawsuit has been filed against McDonald’s over an E. coli outbreak that’s been linked to at least one death and dozens of illnesses across America. Michael Yoshida looks at the growing legal trouble for the fast food giant. 27m ago 1:40 [ ](https://kitchener.citynews.ca/video/2024/10/24/u-s-officials-battling-election-misinformation-and-foreign-interference/) U.S. officials battling election misinformation and foreign interference With less than two weeks to go until election day, American officials are battling misinformation — and this time, it’s not coming from the candidates. Brian Abel looks at the steps being taken to prevent foreign interference. 30m ago
